At Baristas, we're the experts in serving your perfect cup of coffee!

Each coffee subscription is carefully crafted to satisfy your taste. We don't just deliver specialty coffee, we'll deliver an exceptional experience complete with recipes and industry insight, so that you can enjoy coffee-shop quality at home.

The Roast Spectrum

Light

TIME

In roughly 9 Minutes, the bean achieves a light brown caramel coloring.

ACIDITY

High

AROMA

Characteristically Brightly Flavored; Sweet and Complex Notes

Medium

TIME

In 16 Minutes, the bean reaches a medium walnut brown coloring.

ACIDITY

Balanced

AROMA

Invigorating, Balanced, Slightly Sweet Notes

Dark

TIME

In 30 Minutes, the bean arrives at the characteristically dark rich brown coloring

ACIDITY

Light

AROMA

Bitter, Smoky, Layered

Our expert team of superior Baristas are here to serve you your best cup yet.

Whether you're a novice or a coffee connoisseur, at Baristas.com we're passionate about sharing our love and expertise for specialty brews with fellow coffee enthusiasts.
